      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_105705</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection off a mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion weg von einem Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion outre d'un miroir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão fora de um espelho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione fuori di uno specchio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση από έναν καθρέφτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión de un espejo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows two rays of light from a candle flame reaching a person's eye through reflection off a mirror.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt zwei Strahlen Licht von 
einer Kerzeflamme, die das Auge einer Person durch Reflexion weg von 
einem Spiegel erreicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre deux rayons de lumière d'une
flamme de bougie accédant l'oeil d'une personne par la réflexion 
outre d'un miroir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra dois raios da luz de uma 
flama da vela que alcança o olho de uma pessoa com a reflexão fora 
de um espelho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra due raggi di luce da una 
fiamma della candela che raggiunge l'occhio della persona con la 
riflessione fuori di uno specchio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει δύο ακτίνες του φωτός 
από μια φλόγα κεριών που φθάνει στο μάτι ενός προσώπου μέσω 
της αντανάκλασης από έναν καθρέφτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra dos rayos de luz de una 
llama de la vela que alcanza el ojo de una persona con la reflexión 
de un espejo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfallswinkel</string>
          </keyword>
